code: import{SET_AUTH,SET_USER,SET_ROUTE_LINK}from"../types";export var setUser=function setUser(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_USER,payload:payload});};};export var setAuth=function setAuth(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_AUTH,payload:payload});};};export var setRouteLink=function setRouteLink(payload){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_ROUTE_LINK,payload:payload});};};
